description.value:
Frequency once per minute

Requirements Your most recent action was to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Tumble Through]{Tumble Through} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Tumbling Strike]{Tumbling Strike}, and you successfully moved through an enemy's space.

You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for this check.
